attributes.action: Ally Ross, TV critic of The Sun, for a MBE for services to journalism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recognise that he is the best TV critic in the UK.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
